Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Recombinant interferon alfa-2b is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: AIDS-related Kaposi sarcoma. It is used in certain adults who do not have many symptoms of the disease.
Follicular lymphoma that is aggressive. It is used with combination chemotherapy in adults.
Melanoma. It is used as adjuvant therapy in adults who have had surgery and have a high risk of recurrent cancer.

Section.Para: Recombinant interferon alfa-2b is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer and other conditions.
